text: Kalki's Great Escape is an Indian travel television show that premiered on Fox Life on 17 September 2016 at 8 p.m. IST. The show is hosted by actor Kalki Koechlin. Kalki's Great Escape focusses on the bike journey of Koechlin and her father, Joel Koechlin, through Northeast India, exploring the cultures of Assam, Meghalaya and Arunachal Pradesh. Koechlin and her father covered a journey of nearly riding on a Royal Enfield Himalayan Bike. ==References== Category:Travel Channel original programming
title: Kalki's Great Escape
